Shot to death by Omar Ulmer and Donny Donowitz with wrist guns in an attack orchestrated by The Basterds.
Burned alive after setting the cinema on fire. (Debatable)
Shot to death by Omar Ulmer with a machine gun after being trapped in the burning theater by Marcel in an attack orchestrated by The Basterds. Shared kill between Marcel and all the Basterds.
Accidentally blown up with the bombs attached to Omar and Donny in an attack orchestrated by The Basterds. Shared kill between Marcel and all the Basterds.
Blown up with a suicide bomb.
Shot to death by Aldo Raine with a pistol.
